mapper.select: SELECT M.FCT_CD as fctCd FROM (SELECT * FROM FCT_INFO WHERE LINE_NO IN (SELECT P.LINE_NO FROM PRD_PRC_MNG P WHERE P.instr_no IN (SELECT M.instr_no from PRD_PRC_MNG M where M.now_phs = '라인가동종료') AND work_fin_dt > to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd')-2 GROUP BY P.LINE_NO,P.INSTR_NO HAVING sum(P.flt_cnt) > (select round(goal_cnt *0.05) from (select distinct instr_no, goal_cnt from prd_prc_mng) where instr_no = p.instr_no) )) M LEFT JOIN (SELECT FCT_CD FROM FCT_FIX_MNG WHERE req_dt > (sysdate -1) AND( FIX_PHS = '수리요청' or FIX_PHS = '수리중' or FIX_PHS = '수리완료') ) P ON M.FCT_CD = P.FCT_CD WHERE P.FCT_CD IS NULL
